Reviews.Author: L. Salamun
Reviews.Content: My daughter wanted this camera for Christmas because it was small and pink.  It has turned out to be a great purchase.  The picture quality it great.  It's easy to change scene functions.  The video quality is decent for such a small camera.  It seems to be durable, having survived a few falls already with no damage.  Overall, I am very pleased with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Amazing video and audio quality
Reviews.Author: Martina "Martina"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to take still pictures, and mostly, the pictures are sharp. There is often red-eye, but that is easily corrected. What I wanted to address in this review is the amazing audio and video quality, which I did not expect. I was at a music club one night and shot video of the singer, and got a huge positive response to it, even from the performer.Nearly every concert video I have taken with this little camera has turned out flawless. The only two things keeping me from giving it 5 stars are: (1) The tiny microphone is located at the top of the camera in a place where I would naturally place my fingers to hold the camera, so if I forget and cover the mic, the audio gets muddled; and (2) the battery does not last more than about 40 minutes while shooting videos, but I suppose having a back-up battery handy would solve that.I could buy a fancier camera for my new video-taping hobby, but I don't know that the quality would be any better. I've had recording artists use my music videos for their promotion, and a media outlet used one for an Internet interview. So, if you like to shoot video, you may not need a separate flip or video camera. This little camera really gets the job done, and it's a slickly designed camera, too. [...]

Reviews.Title: Jury is out
Reviews.Author: Blake Curl, Jr. "Blake"
Reviews.Content: The jury is still out. In auto mode with auto flash on, picture is over exposed and washed out. (too much lighting)  I had the Sony T9 before this one and got perfect flash exposures. I love the touch screen features and the straight forward settings and will rate the product 5 stars if I resolve the exposure issues, otherwise I will have to return it.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME ! SATISFIED !
Reviews.Author: J. A. Garcia "obn0xious"
Reviews.Content: This product was bought for my girlfriend and she loves it ! It takes awesome pictures and the battery last fairly long. Shes addicted so its a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Cybershot
Reviews.Author: DougPick "DougPick"
Reviews.Content: So Far so good. Gave as a gift to my daughter on Xmas 2009. She asks for a camera every year. This is the best one so far. Easy to use with large touch screen and some sort of face focus thing that is great . Now my wife wants one.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-Shot
Reviews.Author: L. Ricca
Reviews.Content: This camera is a great little camera.  It's certainly a good choice and I am satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Pleased after moving to Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: Fede Rega
Reviews.Content: I am a serious amateur photographer with a techy background. I have had 4 Canon Powershots inf 5 years and currently own a DSLR Canon XTi. I love Canon because of the user interface. I bought this DSC-T90 for my 11-year daughter and decided to change to Sony after having had different screen failures in all four Powershots. I am very pleased with the Sony interface... it's very friendly. Screen is touch, which is great and the size is pretty good. The Intelligent Auto Adjustment and Scene Recognition features are just great. It can automatically take an additional picture under special conditions with different settings to try to get the best picture possible. It records movie at 1280x720 (HD) in MP4 format. Included software (Picture Motion Browser) has a very nice organizer capability with detection of special conditions in pictures already stored at the computer: smiles, one-person, multiple persons, etc. A good thing is that Memory Stick prices are much more reasonable now.

Reviews.Title: Pocket Pics
Reviews.Author: J. DONNELLY "pachomp"
Reviews.Content: This camera fits in a pocket, so you can take it anywhere.  Pictures taken indoors and at night don't come out well at all even if you adjust the proper settings.  The same goes for action photos.  However, the pictures and colors are nice if you take them in perfect weather.  I really like the large touch screen viewer.

Reviews.Title: ok camera
Reviews.Author: Diana Heredia
Reviews.Content: i loved the design of this camera which is mainly why i bought it but it doesnt always take the best pictures; for example, sometimes it will take a really good pic and then the next pic will be blurry or dotty(you can see what looks like dots on your pic) so lets say i take 100 pictures im lucky if half came out decent looking...this camera, on the other hand, takes great movies!!! before i bought this sony camera i used to use my sisters canon, and honestly that was a better camera at least picture wise!!

Reviews.Title: Worth every cent......
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "SR"
Reviews.Content: Hi,I am in love with this product. It looks hot, is very sleek, fits in anywhere, easy to operate, has amazing features, features like smile shutter etc can make you really glee with pride when you are trying to show this off to ur frs!!!Overall, it doesnt get better than this.Thanks,Sanketh

Reviews.Title: For the new baby
Reviews.Author: K. Sanders
Reviews.Content: Absoutely love this camera.  Bought it for my 16 year so she would take pictures of my new born.... Very good plan.

Reviews.Title: God get, room for improvement
Reviews.Author: Wellington Guzman "W."
Reviews.Content: Good aesthetics/design. I was impressed by the video recording quality. The flash options were also a welcomed feature, not to mention smile detection.The touch and ISO sensitivity needs to be increased.

Reviews.Title: Sony has lost its lustre as a consumer tech giant
Reviews.Author: Glencoe resident "glencoe resident"
Reviews.Content: For years I thought SONY was the consumer Tech leader and innovator, that was up until I purchased the DSC T90! This camera is/was a gift for my wife, I am trying to ween her off a Canon film SLR. I was looking for an easy to use point and shoot camera that would be dependable and easy on the pocketbook; so far so good. Amazon shipped the camera promptly and all was well.Upon opening the box, there is a printed message that states " do not contact the Seller if you are experiencing trouble with this product". I know from previous experiences THAT IS NEVER A GOOD SIGN!Shrugging off that ominous message, I put an 8Gb Memory Stick Duo card in the device. I got a message to "re-insert memory card". I tried inserting other compatible memory cards and the only one that worked is a 2GB card. I went to Sony's website signed up for a chat session with their digital camera guys and got the bad news the camera has to be returned to Sony for service! No way was I going to return a brand new product to any manufacturer for service. I notified Amazon of my issues and they promptly sent me a new replacement Sony DSC T90.Upon getting the new replacement camera, I installed a 8GG memory stick duo and got the message "re-insert memory card"! Ugh!!!Now I have the choice of living with a camera that will accept only 2GB memory sticks or send it back and start all over again.Shame on SONY!

Reviews.Title: Awesome Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Janice C. Rock
Reviews.Content: I've been buying Sony Cybershot cameras for years, stepping up as the cameras increased in performance.  This is the 4th and the best.  The Cybershot series has wonderful stabilization.  It's easy to use and quick to learn all of the "extras".

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: L. Gary "teech"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera - excellent picture quality, easy to use, and very light weight. Sony products are always of the highest quality and the DSC-T90 is no exception.  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: You Will Be Taken For a Ride
Reviews.Author: Jazz It Up Baby
Reviews.Content: Coating peeled off. Screen developed a bubble-like spot on it. Customer service staff intrusive/nasty. Got it fix/replaced and it flooded immediately upon contact with water. Now, after waiting more than a month, it was returned as being unfixable and I was taken for a ride. I will never buy anything from Sony again.

Reviews.Title: Bad choice for any indoor photography
Reviews.Author: Holl G. Bayonas "Holli B."
Reviews.Content: Bought the T90 after having the P-200 because of its sleak design and great reviews. We were trying to decide between the 290 and 90. The T90 had amazing video compared to the older sony that we had. Outdoor photos are very crisp and have great color. It is a small camera so it was very easy to take it anywhere, however, very few photos that we take indoors in medium light situations are clear. There is a lot of blurr (yes, I read the manual and tried every possible setting), which outweighs the convenience of this camera. In addition, it seemed like we were always charging the battery. The battery life is very poor and the indicator somewhat inaccurate. After having this camera for about 8 months and gravitating back to our old camera, we got the W290. I would not recommend the T90 if most of your photos will be indoors and especially if they are indoor candid photos of children. I would recommend if you are a camper and need a lightweight camera for you landscape shots, but don't take any movies on your trip, which seems to really suck out the battery power.

Reviews.Title: Blurrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrryyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!
Reviews.Author: Neomentat
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my X-mas trip to Vegas with the family. The camera is compact and the battery life was good. However, when we got home and uploaded the pictures onto the computer, ALL the pictures are blurry, VERY BLURRY.Buildings and large objects in the background all turned out very crisp and clear with nice color contrast, but persons all turned out extremely blurry, I can not believe out of the 300 photos I took they all turned out bad so I know it's the camera and not me. This is my 4th digital camera and first Sony, I think it will be the last one as this camera is sitting in it's box and back to Amazon.What a POS, a big disappointment and a waste of my time.

Reviews.Title: Just a small camera, no big deal.
Reviews.Author: H. Zhao
Reviews.Content: This camera has great features for beginners. But having no Aperture Priority or Shutter Priority stops the beginner from learning from a simple point-and-shoot to a DSLR camera.The battery life is abysmal. The manual says it can only handle about 200 images. I usually take a lot more than that in a day so I have to recharge the battery, but it takes 2-3 hours to charge the battery. That's too long for me.The camera does not allow for deletion of all the images at once. I have to select each picture to delete them, waste of time unless you are simply just going to reformat the memory stick. That ought to wipe all the images.The good thing about this camera is its size. I can carry it around in my pocket and the thieves wouldn't notice it easily.The photos look good on the LCD and on the computer as should any good camera.All in all, it's a good camera for the price. I just wish it has a better battery.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Pawandeep S. Hunjan
Reviews.Content: This piece of machinery is awesome. You become aware of new ways to use it everyday. The pictures are awesome and the video in 720p is also of high quality. I would say that it is a great buy for this price.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Gracie
Reviews.Content: Great pictures! and features; moreover, the sony tech support is the fast and really helpful.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Manan N. Thakkar
Reviews.Content: This Sony Cybershot DSC-T90 camera is the best item I have bought from Amazon. It was sent to me in top condition and I was absolutely thrilled to recieve it. The best part about this camera is that I got the cheapest deal with a 4GB memory card and a carrying case. Amazon is a great place to buy many products online and I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE CAMERA; HORRIBLE SUPPORT
Reviews.Author: Ping Porsche
Reviews.Content: WHY CAN'T I GIVE NEGATIVE STARS?DON'T BUY THIS OR ANY OTHER SONY CAMERA!!!!!Sony makes crap cameras and their support will accuse you of breaking it.Purchase from a respectable camera maker like Canon, Nikon, or Fuji.I bought this for snorkeling and it corrupted my memory card on the first trip.OK, $10,000 trip with no pictures, because the camera corrupted the memory.Called Sony and they blamed the memory.Got two new memory cards for the next trip.OK, new trip, $5k trip with no pictures because the entire stupid camera craps out.Called Sony, no apologies, no emergency loaner, just a send it in with the receipt so we can verify it's still under warranty.Sent the camera in to the depot, on my own dime.They call and accused me of opening the camera door.What idiots! Why the hell would I do that? So I can ruin my pictures?  TWICE????!!!!!I contacted all the way up to national customer support.All idiots along the way.They didn't do a user test underwater.They just dunk it and say it's still WATER-RESISTANT, so it must be user error.F#$% OFF SONY!!!!Whatever you do, buy something else and save your money, this is a horrible product, that takes horrible pictures and is slow as mud, with a horrible touchscreen that doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: No quite Satisfied with this SONY CyberSHOT
Reviews.Author: Yaman Shrestha
Reviews.Content: Thought that it would be a good buy but not good as i expected. The quality degrades while taking pics in the night usually the dark objects. You'll see lot of NOISE! Wont recommend this cam.

Reviews.Title: 12MP but the quality is from 1999
Reviews.Author: A. Otto "Bargain Babe"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as an upgrade from my 3 year old 6 MP Sony. Initially it seemed enticing, what with the 12 megapixels, slim profile, and touch screen. Don't let the bling fool you. The quality of the pictures are horrible, and the autofocus leaves a lot to be desired. The touch screen isn't hard plastic like the iPhone, and got a scratch just from being in my pocket. A closeup reveals a lot of "noise" and almost all flash photos have a gray haze to them that the most advance photo retouching cannot remove. Zeiss is probably rolling over in his grave knowing his name is on this camera. This would be awesome, because it has a lot of practical in camera functions, but until the quality is right, they aren't even worth mentioning.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: J. Prager
Reviews.Content: There are many cool features on this camera.  It is a bit spendy but worth every cent!!

Reviews.Title: Love this camera! Best Mother's Day gift!!!
Reviews.Author: Karima Mohamed "Expert Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for Mother's Day and love it!!! It is touch screen and is so high-tech, yet user friendly. The color is gorgeous and girly. Its so slim and takes great pictures! Karima Khatib Mohamed, Sacramento CA

Reviews.Title: Excellent Value Excellent Picture Quality
Reviews.Author: S. Warner "Trevor's Mom"
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this camera for a trip to France. She found it easy to use and the picture and video quality was excellent!  It is a good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-T90 12 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: John S. Craighill
Reviews.Content: Always bought Sony digital camera and love the product. Dealing with Amazon has been easy and efficient, plus Amazon usually has one of the best prices on the net.

Reviews.Title: Returned for Refund
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth V. Brennan
Reviews.Content: There is no doubt that the Sony T90 is one of the cutest compact camera's on the market - but my little baby was returned back to the store - and here's why...Pros:* Compact and Cute (Blue color was awesome)* HD movies* The on camera Slideshow is fun to watch with sound/music.Cons:* Sometimes hard to open / close* Doesn't always take a great picture* Difficult to switch between taking pictures and movie mode.* Difficult to see the icons on the camera (they are actually blurry)* I accidently touched the screen while taking pictures (many times), and activating a menu option (accidently) -- there is no where to put your thumb.* Displaying pictures on the camera is a process - zooming in and out of a photo is also a pain.* The touchscreen icons are blurry.* Pricey - fair price (in my opinion) is $150Netnet: This little camera really can't do anything a $100 camera can't do aside from the slideshow with music feature. Just my opinion - Good Luck.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality
Reviews.Author: Vaz Man
Reviews.Content: I only give it one star because you can't give it 0 stars. Not only is it not waterproof, it's not even water resistant.  First vacation, first day in the pool, less then in one foot of water and it leaked.  Sony couldn't fix it after 3 attempts, the warranty expired and they stopped responding to my requests.  Sony is definitely not what they used to be.  In my opinion they're just out for that quick buck now days.  The Sony quality has gone down the drain.My recommendation is to buy a camera from a known camera manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Camera.
Reviews.Author: V. Kalyanaraman "Machinechip"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before thanksgiving and returned it less than a month.  This camera cannot overlay dates on the pictures.  So it is impossible to know when exactly the picture was taken unless you goto the computer and see the saved date - no body does this.  So I guess this feature singlehandedly made me to return this camera.  We all take pictures to create memory. How good is that memory if we dont know when it was created!Indoor picture quality is very bad. Lots of grains even at the best possible setting. HD Video is good.Also when it is cold outside, touch screen is very annoying. Opening and closing the front flap is a pain. No grip on the flap to open/close. So pretty much you have to wedge it everytime.  Pathetic design!SONY Disappionted me with this camera and lost a long time loyal customer.  Thanks Sony!

Reviews.Title: Great gift
Reviews.Author: D. Houston "Legal Eagle"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a pre-Christmas gift for a friend. Over 3 weeks have gone by and he says he loves it and it takes great pictures.  I have seen some of those pictures and they are indeed great quality.  My friend has nothing but praise and no complaints for this camera.  I therefore give 5 stars based on his input (he speaks only Spanish, does not shop Amazon, does not have an Amazon account, and, although he loves the camera, did not want to write a review).  Were my friend able to write an English review, he would give 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: My wife loves it
Reviews.Author: A. Lang "giphlag"
Reviews.Content: She seems very happy with this camera. Loves the small form factor and the high-tech touch screen. All around great camera.

Reviews.Title: !2.1 mega pixels=Heaven
Reviews.Author: C. Gualandri
Reviews.Content: This camera is top of the line. Using this camera is so much better than even a Nikon Coolpix P90.

Reviews.Title: confused
Reviews.Author: y0ur7up "y0ur7up"
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera today and I love everything on it except for the touch screen.. it doesnt respond well to my touch for some reason.. i am able to tap it with my finger nail but im afraid i will damage the screen.. does anybody else have problems with this? if you have any advice for me please email me at [...]

Reviews.Title: One digital camera that didn't last very long.
Reviews.Author: amazonbuyer321
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for less than two years and it eventually broke down. The screen started having fuzzy white lines and a completely black screen and when I tried to take pictures or videos, nothing would show up except what's on the screen prior. I would not recommend anyone to buy this kind of sony cybershot. It sucks and it's not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera - small & great pics
Reviews.Author: G. Shok
Reviews.Content: Who needs more than 12MP in their pocket?Not I.Tiny little camera with amazing features.
